fields.name: Radio (Passive):
fields.value: Access a facional chat with other Police subaligned players.

fields.name: Police Immunity (Passive):
fields.value: You are never considered to have committed a crime.

fields.name: Administrative Detail:
fields.value: Use during evening. Unlock the abilities of any Police-subaligned player.

fields.name: Protective Command (Passive):
fields.value: If you are attacked, a Police-subaligned player will defend you and counterattack the attacker. You may choose who this player is at any time. If noone is chosen, then the Police-subaligned player with the lowest standard deviation will protect you instead (that's not an Unseen, if possible)
